short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to get shortcuts for GeeksforGeeks Code execution

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your coding experience on GeeksforGeeks with our Chrome extension, designed to bring the convenience of LeetCode-style shortcut keys to the GeeksforGeeks platform. Effortlessly navigate through problems, run code, and submit solutions with just a few keystrokes. Whether you're a competitive programmer or preparing for coding interviews, this extension streamlines your workflow, making your time on GeeksforGeeks more productive and efficient.

Features:

Shortcut Keys: Use intuitive keyboard shortcuts to run code, submit solutions, and more, similar to the functionality on LeetCode.

Seamless Integration: Works seamlessly with the existing GeeksforGeeks interface, providing a smooth user experience.

Transform the way you interact with GeeksforGeeks and optimize your problem-solving process with this must-have extension for any coder.
